title: 1 Chronicles 25:1
text: MOREOVER David and the captains of the host separated to the service of the sons of Asaph, and of Heman, and of Jeduthun, who should prophesy with harps, with psalteries, and with cymbals: and the number of the workmen according to their service was:

title: 1 Chronicles 25:2
text: Of the sons of Asaph; Zaccur, and Joseph, and Nethaniah, and Asarelah, the sons of Asaph under the hands of Asaph, which prophesied according to the order of the king.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:3
text: Of Jeduthun: the sons of Jeduthun; Gedaliah, and Zeri, and Jeshaiah, Hashabiah, and Mattithiah, six, under the hands of their father Jeduthun, who prophesied with a harp, to give thanks and to praise the LORD.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:4
text: Of Heman: the sons of Heman; Bukkiah, Mattaniah, Uzziel, Shebuel, and Jerimoth, Hananiah, Hanani, Eliathah, Giddalti, and Romamti-ezer, Joshbekashah, Mallothi, Hothir, and Mahazioth:

title: 1 Chronicles 25:5
text: All these were the sons of Heman the king's seer in the words of God, to lift up the horn.  And God gave to Heman fourteen sons and three daughters.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:6
text: All these were under the hands of their father for song in the house of the LORD, with cymbals, psalteries, and harps, for the service of the house of God, according to the king's order to Asaph, Jeduthun, and Heman.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:7
text: So the number of them, with their brethren that were instructed in the songs of the LORD, even all that were cunning, was two hundred fourscore and eight.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:8
text: And they cast lots, ward against ward, as well the small as the great, the teacher as the scholar.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:9
text: Now the first lot came forth for Asaph to Joseph: the second to Gedaliah, who with his brethren and sons were twelve:

title: 1 Chronicles 25:10
text: The third to Zaccur, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:

title: 1 Chronicles 25:11
text: The fourth to Izri, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:

title: 1 Chronicles 25:12
text: The fifth to Nethaniah, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:

title: 1 Chronicles 25:13
text: The sixth to Bukkiah, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:

title: 1 Chronicles 25:14
text: The seventh to Jesharelah, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:

title: 1 Chronicles 25:15
text: The eighth to Jeshaiah, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:

title: 1 Chronicles 25:16
text: The ninth to Mattaniah, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:

title: 1 Chronicles 25:17
text: The tenth to Shimei, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:

title: 1 Chronicles 25:18
text: The eleventh to Azareel, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:

title: 1 Chronicles 25:19
text: The twelfth to Hashabiah, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:

title: 1 Chronicles 25:20
text: The thirteenth to Shubael, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:

title: 1 Chronicles 25:21
text: The fourteenth to Mattithiah, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:

title: 1 Chronicles 25:22
text: The fifteenth to Jeremoth, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:

title: 1 Chronicles 25:23
text: The sixteenth to Hananiah, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:

title: 1 Chronicles 25:24
text: The seventeenth to Joshbekashah, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:

title: 1 Chronicles 25:25
text: The eighteenth to Hanani, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:

title: 1 Chronicles 25:26
text: The nineteenth to Mallothi, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:

title: 1 Chronicles 25:27
text: The twentieth to Eliathah, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:

title: 1 Chronicles 25:28
text: The one and twentieth to Hothir, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:

title: 1 Chronicles 25:29
text: The two and twentieth to Giddalti, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:

title: 1 Chronicles 25:30
text: The three and twentieth to Mahazioth, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:

title: 1 Chronicles 25:31
text: The four and twentieth to Romamti-ezer, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve.
